meanings.definition: A type of leather made from the outer side of a hide, giving it a soft, velvety feel.
meanings.sent1: The store displayed stylish bags made of nubucks.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pair of comfortable sandals crafted from nubucks.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to nap on the luxurious nubucks couch.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a nubucks quality, smooth and soothing.
meanings.sent5: The nubucks gloves felt like a gentle hug on her hands.

meanings.definition: A shoe or boot made from nubuck leather.
meanings.sent1: He admired the durability of his nubucks hiking boots.
meanings.sent2: She cleaned her favorite nubucks sneakers after a muddy walk.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to bury the nubucks shoe in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her nubucks boots were like clouds for her feet, so comfy.
meanings.sent5: The nubucks loafers gleamed under the sunlight, elegant and classy.
